metadata.title: President summons joint session of Parliament on March 10

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Mar 7 (APP):President Asif Ali Zardari Friday summoned a joint session of the Parliament on March 10, 2025 (Monday) at 3:00 PM at the Parliament House. The President summoned the joint session of Parliament in exercise of the powers conferred by article 54(1) and 56(3) of the Constitution of Pakistan.
